Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: The {{-o}} flag was unused and removed from peer/node/start in https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/27187. The compose file, however, continues to use the -o flag (https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-samples/blob/master/chaincode-docker-devmode/docker-compose-simple.yaml#L38) and that causes the command to terminate.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: I do not want to add dead code back to the peer node start command and would prefer the fabric sample be corrected.

Action.author: wlahti
Action.body: On behalf of Matt, whose internet is currently not working: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/c/28116/
